channel.title: **FIRST2ESCAPE** DodianBased!VPS
channel.description:
[u][center][size=14pt]Welcome to First2escape!!![/size][/center] Hey everyone today i wanted to show you a few pictures of my server and hope you will join it.I am posting this is the advertisement page because the server status page doesnt seem to be working.
This is a old school Dodian server mostly everything works.I have added some random item drops hopefully i will add more within the next 2 days.
[b]First few 3-6 people will get about 10 or so drop parties hosted by owner -escape-himself..Also possibly giving away 3mil to first 3.I will be off within 2 hours from now..[/b]
The server is hosted 24/7 on a vps..I dont believe it will be gone anytime soon.. You can log on the server by using any client...I am in the progress of updating my client still
Server ip: First2escape.no-ip.biz port: 43594 server ip:First2escape.no-ip.biz port: 43594 Here are a few pictures. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/825/f14v.png/][IMG]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/6931/f14v.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/3hqk.png/][IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/8471/3hqk.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/826/dz7p.png/][IMG]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/481/dz7p.png[/img][/URL]
